verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: was] offered the opportunity to deny he once referred to African nations as ' shithole ' countries while hosting Nigerian President Muhammad
[ARG2: President Donald Trump] was [V: offered] [ARG1: the opportunity to deny he once referred to African nations as ' shithole ' countries while hosting Nigerian President Muhammad]
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] was offered the opportunity to [V: deny] [ARG1: he once referred to African nations as ' shithole ' countries while hosting Nigerian President Muhammad]

President Donald Trump was offered the opportunity to deny [ARG0: he] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: referred] [ARG1: to African nations] [ARG2: as ' shithole ' countries] [ARGM-TMP: while hosting Nigerian President Muhammad]
President Donald Trump was offered the opportunity to deny [ARG0: he] once referred to African nations as ' shithole ' countries while [V: hosting] [ARG1: Nigerian President Muhammad]
